txt.en:
'I welcome you to Archet, fellow Captain! I specialize in teaching warriors such as yourself useful skills and abilities. I presume you are here for just such a purpose, so here is a word of advice:

'Remember, a Captain does not best serve his companions by running recklessly into the fray. Nay, it is when he stands behind and directs the efforts of his fellows that he truly shines. There he can see weaknesses in his enemies or press his companions forwards and inspire them to victory.

'Show me your skill by using <rgb=#00ff00>Devastating Blow</rgb>.'

HINT:

Captains rely on their <rgb=#00ff00>Battle Shout</rgb> to put them into a <rgb=#ffff00>Battle-Readied State</rgb>. While in this state, Captains can use special skills such as <rgb=#00ff00>Devastating Blow</rgb>, an effective attack that deals a great deal of damage. Attack the <rgb=#ff0000>Training Dummy</rgb> with your <rgb=#00FF00>Battle Shout</rgb> to put you into a <rgb=#ffff00>Battle-Readied State</rgb> and then attack the dummy with your <rgb=#00ff00>Devastating Blow</rgb>.
'Well done, [placeholder]!  As you grow, you will learn additional skills. Good luck!'

'Strike the training-dummy with your new skill and return to me. We must make certain that you are prepared to stand against the dangers of Middle-earth.'

HINT:

Captains rely on their <rgb=#00ff00>Battle Shout</rgb> to put them into a <rgb=#ffff00>Battle-Readied State</rgb>. While in this state, Captains can use special skills such as <rgb=#00ff00>Devastating Blow</rgb>, an effective attack that deals a great deal of damage. Attack the <rgb=#ff0000>Training Dummy</rgb> with your <rgb=#00FF00>Battle Shout</rgb> to put you into a <rgb=#ffff00>Battle-Readied State</rgb> and then attack the dummy with your <rgb=#00ff00>Devastating Blow</rgb>.
Your trainer wants you to use your new skills to prove that you are ready to face the many dangers that exist in the world.
You have successfully used Devastating Blow
Use your <rgb=#00ff00>Battle Shout</rgb> on the training-dummy, then strike it with your skill <rgb=#00ff00>Devastating Blow</rgb>

Use <rgb=#00ff00>Devastating Blow</rgb>on the training-dummy nearby. 

HINT:

Captains rely on their <rgb=#00ff00>Battle Shout</rgb> to put them into a <rgb=#ffff00>Battle-Readied State</rgb>. While in this state, Captains can use special skills such as <rgb=#00ff00>Devastating Blow</rgb>, an effective attack that deals a great deal of damage. Attack the <rgb=#ff0000>Training Dummy</rgb> with your <rgb=#00FF00>Battle Shout</rgb> to put you into a <rgb=#ffff00>Battle-Readied State</rgb> and then attack the dummy with your <rgb=#00ff00>Devastating Blow</rgb>.
Talk to the Captain Trainer in Archet

The Captain Trainer is in the training grounds of Archet, very near the gate.\n\nNow that you have successfully used your newly-learned skill, you should return to your trainer and tell him of your success.
